Grider  
InclusiveContext The InclusiveContext is an interface designed to enable CDS providers to encapsulate the query for data from multiple EDS providers into a single request.
Methoder The marker interface for provider's executiny any service task.
Monitorable All providers that need to be monitored implement this interface.
Persister  
Provider This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed.

Class Summary
SorcerEnv  
UEID Sometimes it's critical to identify an exertion associated with a provider.
 

Exception Summary
AccessDeniedException Any interaction with the MonitorableServicer might result in this exception due to the following reason: unauthorized control of the running job/task.
ComprehensiveContextException  
UnknownExertionException Any interaction with the MonitorSessionManager might result in this exception due to the following reasons: The session does not exist, Some operations on this session which was not valid.
